article_title: How Lawmakers Stopped Part of Obama’s Assault on First Amendment
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: Taking action to forestall the IRS from abusing ordinary Americans for speaking out either by themselves or through membership organizations that share their views is essential to protecting their First Amendment rights.
